thread.title: Clasify Classified Listing <= 1.0.7 - Reflected Cross-Site Scripting
thread.title_full: Clasify Classified Listing <= 1.0.7 - Reflected Cross-Site Scripting

title: Clasify Classified Listing <= 1.0.7 - Reflected Cross-Site Scripting
text:
CVE |
|
---|
The Clasify Classified Listing plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.7 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
Software Type | Plugin |
---|---|
Software Slug |
clasify-classified-listing
|
